name: Immigration Clinics
description: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) regularly hosts free and confidential citizenship and general immigration clinics for eligible Bay Area residents. Clinics are currently held online via Zoom. Eligible legal permanent residents can get help completing their naturalization applications. During these virtual clinics, trained volunteers assist clients under the supervision of IIBA legal staff. IIBA provides free representation to clinic participants and will review and file completed nat

howToGetIt: If youâ€™re interested in attending an upcoming citizenship clinic, please contact an IIBA office near you. The IIBA team is currently conducting consultations and appointments by phone. Please contact an office near you to make an appointment.
